articles.content: Tim Henman was shocked by the attitude shown by Novak Djokovic, after the world No. 1 ‘steamrolled’ his way past Yoshihito Nishoka in the opening round of the French Open. Djokovic saw off his Japane… [+1778 chars]

articles.title: 'We loved each other' - Newcastle careers ending this week as players and staff get emotional - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Newcastle United will let a number of stalwarts go this summer but their contribution will never be forgotten after helping to keep the Magpies in the Premier League for so many years
